backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, slot settings, pricing, and blocked slots with strict owner-based admin authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module returning the previous actor state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the emergency ownership reset UI addition and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, themes, and global providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin calendar view generating daily slots and displaying booking/blocked statuses.
frontend/src/components/admin/BlockSlots: Dialog allowing admins to block or unblock a slot with reason input and mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/EarningsTr: Displays daily and weekly earnings based on a selectable date, fetching data via hooks and rendering revenue and booking counts.
frontend/src/components/admin/EmergencyO: Provides a form for entering an emergency reset code to trigger an ownership reset using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingRul: Loads pricing rules, allows editing weekday/weekend rates and floodlight hour, and saves updates via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/SlotSettin: Fetches slot settings and provides a form to update opening/closing times and slot duration with validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessRestr: Shows an access‑restricted message for non-admin users with a button to return to the booking page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Ensures a user is authenticated and an admin, redirecting otherwise and prompting for profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/customer/Availab: Displays available hourly slots with formatted time and price, allowing users to select a slot. Shows a fallback message when no slots exist.
frontend/src/components/customer/Booking: Collects customer details and submits a booking after authentication, using slot settings and navigation to the payment page. Manages form validation and Internet Identity login flow.
Shows a read‑only summary of the user's chosen date, time, sport, and total price. Used to review booking details before confirmation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and routed content. Handles route-type detection and admin/customer navigation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on change. Supports authenticated and anonymous actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context for login, identity loading, and status tracking using Dfinity AuthClient. Exposes helper flags and functions for authentication state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, ownership actions, and other backend interactions using the actor. Includes mutation helpers with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and defines light/dark theme CSS variables with a neon-accent dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for calendar, settings, and earnings components.
Handles admin authentication, ownership claiming, and redirects using Internet Identity and related queries.
frontend/src/pages/customer/BookingConfi: Displays booking confirmation details, formatting date and time and handling loading or missing bookings.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerBook: Lets customers select a date, view available slots, calculate prices, and proceed to booking.
frontend/src/pages/customer/PaymentPlace: Shows a temporary payment info page with supported methods and routes to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/ReceiptLooku: Provides a form for users to enter a booking ID and navigate to the receipt page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), store them in sessionStorage, retrieve persisted values, and clear them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state and feature requests related to adding emergency ownership reset functionality and tightening admin authorization after reset.
